messages.message: Hi all, I just submitted a PR (pull/67794 (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/67794)), but I'm seeing an issue with missing code coverage. Not sure how it's 0% but when I click on it it shows a bunch of `.tsx` files as missing coverage which I haven't touched in my PR. I'm guessing this is because I only made backend changes which didn't cause any FE tests to run, but coverage is still being measured against React files? Would anyone be able to clarify why I'm seeing this failed check?
btw this currently is not a required check, so you should be able to merge your PR even if this check fails!
cc @sitaram @jayapandian.ponraj to clarify how we analyze code coverage in this check

Hey @Serena @prateek.tenkale we have removed the code coverage check on new code and it should not be a blocker, the check you are seeing is the overall code coverage and we have yet to decide on how we are going to evaluate this.
